summary: A con man uncovers a deadly secret and must save his lady love, the small-town locals and the little girl who insists she's his daughter, from the mob.
cast: Akshay Kumar|Sonakshi Sinha|Nassar|Yashpal Sharma|Paresh Ganatra|Gurdeep Kohli|Mushtaq Khan|Amit Tiwari|Supreeth Reddy|Ashok Samarth|Anant Jog|Ananya|Raj Arjun|Darshan Jariwala|Kareena Kapoor|Naushaad Abbas|Saniya Anklesaria|Swantatra Bharat|Swatrantra Bharat|Bhupindder Bhoopii|Prabhu Deva|Helena Fonseca|Jayant Gadekar|Pradeep Kabra|Mumait Khan|Meenakshi|Shakti Mohan|Meet Mukhi|Shivansu Sachan|Shireesh Sharma|Joseph Vijay|Maryam Zakaria
title: Rowdy Rathore
